steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"epd3f","text":"To purify GST-LC3B, insert human LC3B cDNA in a pGEX-4T1 vector. Note, the last five amino acids of LC3B are deleted to mimic the cleavage by ATG4.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bkb99","text":"After the transformation of the pGEX-4T1 vector encoding GST-LC3B in E.coli Rosetta (DE3) pLysS cells, grow the cells in LB medium at   until an OD600 of 0.8-1 and induce the protein expression with   IPTG for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":147,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":134,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":199,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":210,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":215,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":14400,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9p7fg","text":"Collect and incubate the supernatant with pre-equilibrated Glutathione Sepharose 4B beads (GE Healthcare) for   at   with gentle shaking to bind GST-LC3B.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":110,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":115,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4lcep","text":"Collect the supernatant, filter through a 0.45 µm syringe filter, concentrate using a 10 kDa cut-off Amicon filter (Merck Millipore), and load onto a pre-equilibrated Superdex 75 16/600 column (Cytiva).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
